lead_paragraph: Overview | How can students use news coverage to bolster their knowledge of the electoral process as well as their understanding of specific elections? In this lesson, students learn about the midterm elections by playing a game of Midterm Election Bingo. They then create their own election bingo games about historical elections or the electoral process.
